firstScreen.description: With a focus on physical storage and a secure digital archive, Iron Mountain provided climate-controlled, private vaults for physical artifacts and implemented a robust repository for digital preservation.
firstScreen.title: A partnership with Iron Mountain

secondScreen.stepFourDescription: Update inventory and user records so redeployed assets stay traceable.
secondScreen.stepOneDescription: Collect devices from global offices, remote teams, and warehouse locations.
secondScreen.stepThreeDescription: Refurbish and redeploy hardware with updated images and documentation.
secondScreen.stepTwoDescription: Scan, sanitize, and transport each asset with full chain-of-custody visibility.
secondScreen.title: Device retrieval & redeployment services
